title: How does traditional Chinese medicine compare with traditional Indian medicine (Ayurveda)?
description: Answer (1 of 4): I read a paper in a journal few months back, which gives a good comparision between the fundamentals of Ayurveda, traditional Chinese medicine (TCM) and traditional Korean medicine ( Sasang constitutional medicine/SCM ).
